attributes.action: Grant power to the people of Great Britain, before he retires as a lasting legacy of his years in office.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To give consideration to all or some of the following: -Parish councils to deal with Parish items; District councils to deal with District items, right up to British Government dealing only with National items. Remove whips from the Commons and the Lords. Have 4 year Terms fixed. Allow MPs to vote as they wish on all subjects without bringing down a government. Have an all appointed second chamber by an elected committee. Have schools run by Educationalists and Hospitals by Medical staff.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
